Class DefectPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.defecttracker.defect.DefectPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DefectPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel to display the fields of a Defect and allow editing
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefectPanel

        public DefectPanel(DefectView parent,
           Defect defect,
           DefectPanel.Mode mode)
        Constructs a DefectPanel for creating or editing a given Defect.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent DefectView.
        defect - The Defect to edit.
        mode - Whether or not the given Defect should be treated as if it already exists on the server (DefectPanel.Mode.EDIT) or not (DefectPanel.Mode.CREATE).

    • Method Detail

      • addComponents

        protected void addComponents()
        Adds the components to the panel and places constraints on them for the SpringLayout manager.
        Parameters:
        layout - the layout manager

      • setInputEnabled

        protected void setInputEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether input is enabled for this panel and its children. This should be used instead of JComponent#setEnabled because setEnabled does not affect its children.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether or not input is enabled.

      • updateModel

        protected void updateModel(Defect defect)
        Updates the DefectPanel's model to contain the values of the given Defect and sets the DefectPanel's editMode to DefectPanel.Mode.EDIT.
        Parameters:
        defect - The Defect which contains the new values for the model.

      • updateModel

        protected void updateModel(Defect defect,
               DefectPanel.Mode mode)
        Updates the DefectPanel's model to contain the values of the given Defect.
        Parameters:
        defect - The Defect which contains the new values for the model.
        mode - The new editMode.
